name: Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo
location: Disneyland Park, Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge

items.title: Coaxium Sipper
items.description: includes choice of Fountain Beverage at time of purchase. Limit five (5) per person, per transaction. No discounts apply.

items.title: Dewback Chili Noodles
items.description: Spiced Fettuccine Noodles, Gingered Ground Pork with Brussel Sprout Leaves, Shredded Red Cabbage

items.title: Fried Chicken Baos
items.description: Two Crispy Chicken Baos, Sweet Chili Sauce, Scallion Salad, Cucumber Coins

items.title: Surabat Valley Greens with Roasted Tip-Yip
items.description: Marinated Chicken, Mixed Greens, Quinoa-Veggie Mix, Mini Peppers, Olives, Cotija Cheese, Cilantro Dressing

items.title: Endorian Fried Chicken Tip-Yip
items.description: Crispy Chicken, Roasted Pepper Mash, Country Gravy, Charred Broccolini

items.title: Felucian Kefta Garden Spread
items.description: Impossible™ Meatballs, Herb Hummus, Tomato-Cucumber Relish, Pita

items.title: Ithorian Garden Patty Bun
items.description: Bao Bun, Impossible™ Patty, Broccolini, House Sauce and a Cuties Mandarin served with choice of small Lowfat Milk or small DASANI® Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Fried Chicken Tip-Yip Youngling Meal
items.description: crispy Chicken, Macaroni and Cheese and Seasonal Vegetables served with choice of small Lowfat Milk or small DASANI® Water

items.title: Vintian Mineral Mousse
items.description: Banana Brûlée-centered Dark Chocolate Mousse, Strawberry Mousse, Vanilla Chantilly, Chocolate Crumble, Cherry Garnish

items.title: Moof Juice
items.description: Simply Fruit Punch®, Simply Orange® with Pineapple, Chipotle-Pineapple

items.title: Phattro
items.description: Gold Peak® Unsweetened Tea, Minute Maid® Lemonade, Desert Pear

items.title: Cold Brew Black Caf
items.description: Cold Brew Coffee topped with Sweet Cream Cheese and Chocolate Puffs

items.title: Sap Tap Cup
items.description: includes Fountain Beverage at time of purchase. Limit ten (10) per person, per transaction. No discounts apply.

items.title: Acid Spitter Orb Sipper
items.description: includes choice of Fountain Beverage at time of purchase. Limit ten (10) per person, per transaction. No discounts apply.
